title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin gives Ben Roethlisberger props for showing toughness after almost completing a huge comeback against the Vikings. He tries to determine what's wrong with the Lakers following a disappointing loss to the Grizzlies and falling to .500 on the season. He also gives out his Blazing 5 picks for week 14 of the NFL season. Plus, Cardinals TE Zach Ertz joins the show to talk about his midseason trade from the Eagles and now contending for a Super Bowl. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
